rows.label: qev016501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ]! Perfect.
I've got just the job for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0002
rows.name:
This last stretch of fighting has been intense.
Our Skell fleet is pretty beat up, as is a lot of our
equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0003
rows.name:
We need to perform some large-scale maintenance,
but we're all but out of aurorite—a relatively common
resource needed for repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Mira's dangerous enough when your gear is working,
but when it's not? Forget it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev016501_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Kirsty that you also think going out
with broken equipment would be suicide.

rows.label: qev016501_JNK0020
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev016501_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that skill is the only thing that matters.

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0005
rows.name:
And you've been through enough tight scrapes to know
how terrifying it can be even WITH working gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Well, aren't we the [ST:gender p1=king p2=queen ] of Awesometown?
Unfortunately, not every BLADE is as fantastically
skilled as you, my liege.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0007
rows.name:
Many of them have civilian backgrounds, and it's
unrealistic to just send them out there with nothing
more than a pointy stick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0008
rows.name:
We've got Pathfinders and Prospectors out gathering
as we speak, but the more their equipment fails, the
more casualties are mounting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'd like you to mine the aurorite we need for our
maintenance and also gather eight HI9 ion thrusters
that can be found in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0010
rows.name:
If you could also recover the data unit that fell there
while you're at it, that would be a huge help.
Do you mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0011
rows.name: It's much appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0012
rows.name:
I have every faith you'll find everything, so I'll whip up
a maintenance schedule while you're out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0013
rows.name:
So access your comm device to connect to FrontierNav
and mine for that aurorite. As for the rest, well...
Just be sure to come home safely. That's an order![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0014
rows.name: All right, that's it. Off you go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0015
rows.name:
You know you'll only find precious resources
such as aurorite with a mining probe, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0016
rows.name:
So if all your data probes are set to be research
probes or some other type, you'll need to swap a few
out for mining probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0017
rows.name:
I won't lecture you on how to go about doing that.
You're a FrontierNav pro by now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Perfect. That should be enough aurorite to get the
BLADEs' equipment back in fighting shape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0019
rows.name: Now we just need the items from Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0020
rows.name: Thank you. It looks like that's everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0021
rows.name:
The materials you've gathered will get broken Skells
back on their feet and also ensure that our BLADEs'
gear is in top working condition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0022
rows.name:
And I'll see that analysis of the data unit you recovered
starts right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev016501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Kirsty what she expects to find on the data unit.

rows.label: qev016501_JNK0040
rows.name: Yawn

rows.label: qev016501_SEL0041
rows.name: Skip to the part where you get paid.

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Classified information from a special project I was on.
Afraid I can't say more than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0024
rows.name: Well, maybe I can say a little...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0025
rows.name:
That data unit represents the bonds I share with some
of my dearest colleagues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Now then, this is for you. I think you'll find it more
than covers you for your troubles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Forget the BLADEs—you should be a mercenary!
But yes, I've got your reward right here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0028
rows.name:
All the precious resources mined from the soils of Mira
can be turned into a wide variety of items that will help
keep New LA safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0029
rows.name:
I hope you'll continue using FrontierNav to dig up all
sorts of new minerals and materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0030
rows.name: We're all depending on it, in fact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Mira's a harsh land full of hostile, terrible things.
Without the support of people like you, even our best
fighters can't hold out for long.[ST:wait ]
